rooms.description: Large open-plan area combining living room, kitchen, and dining space. Emphasis on natural light via large windows along the east and south facades. Vastu compliant layout ensures the main entrance is from the north.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Equipped with modern appliances and ample storage, large windows for natural light.
Seating space adjacent to the living area, with a view of the garden. Vastu principles ensure clear visibility from the entrance.
Primary bedroom placed in the northeast quadrant for positive energy according to Vastu. Features ample natural light and ventilation with windows facing east.
Secondary bedroom located on the north side, ensuring calm and quiet environment, with a window for natural light.
Additional bedroom in the west quadrant. Window placement ensures sufficient airflow.
Bathroom for ground floor with functional design and adequate ventilation. Located adjacent to master_bedroom for privacy.
Home theater integrated into living area or a dedicated multipurpose room with controlled acoustics and ambient lighting. Positioned in the south to avoid direct sunlight while preserving privacy.

openings.description: Primary entrance from the north side of the plot aligning with Vastu principles. Facilitates natural light and fresh air.
Secondary entrance for service personnel located on the east, ensuring smooth traffic flow and separate access from the main entrance.
Exterior door at the south end connecting to outdoor spaces or patio areas, optimizing ventilation.
